lines.text: Okay no more bullshit

[to Dave, talking fast]
was there or wasn't there a woman?
Are you serious?
Yes I'm goddamn serious.
Fuzzy Wuzzy was a woman?
What the hell is he taking about?
He reads lips. You're talking too fast.

[to Dave, talking slowly]
Was there... a wom-an... pres-ent?

[to Capt. Braddock, talking slowly]
Yes. There was... a wom-an... pres-ent.
Why is he talking like that?

[to Capt. Braddock, talking slowly]
Because he's deaf... not stup-id.
Don't we get a last request?
What would you like?
Would you scratch my nose for me?
[Eve scratches his nose with a coin and then kisses him]
You're a very sick woman.
Thank you. Mr Karew, what would you you like?
I suppose a fuck is out of the question.
I'm afraid so.
Today I threatened to shoot a naked woman with my erection.
Where are we?
Probably on our way to New Jersey by now.
No kidding! I got family in there! Do you wanna come with me?

Of course. You've earned my trust, Wally. You've been a very good friend to me these past couple days. You're always there for me. You never get me into trouble. Sometimes it seems a bit boring but that's a small price to pay for such a wonderful friendship.
That's beautiful, Dave. Do you mean everything you just said?
I'll tell you how I really feel in about a minute or two. Right now I'm a little overwhelmed by the STINK of the seven tons of garbage that you drove us into!
Is THAT what it is? I thought you let one go! That's why I didn't say anything!
That's very kind of you! Thank you!
[Dave doesn't hold up any fingers]
How many fingers am I holding up in front of your eyes right now?
Three!
That's good. That's pretty good, considering that he's blind.

[impersonating a European doctor]
Tell me the first thing that pops into your brain.
Pussy!
It's amazing! This man is cured!
These streets are bumpy.
You're driving on the sidewalk!
Wally! He could put a hole through your *head*, Wally!
*Fuck* him and his holes!
Why do you feel you have to pass for someone with 20/20 vision when you're blind as a bat?
I don't feel. I have to pass.
Yes, you do. It's a sickness in your brain, just like if you were trying to pass for white.
You mean I'm not white?
I hear prison isn't so bad if you like it up the butt.
You swear an awful lot.
You're fucking-A right!
Did she say ship, or shit?
So, you're the fat fuck that runs this show!
Beautifully put, Mr. Karew. You're obviously a poet, a man after my own heart.
And then one day, my wife turned into this remarkable creature that could sit on the end of a broom stick and take off. She could actually achieve flight.
I think I was married to that woman once.
Small world.

[Dave and Wally are booking in at a hotel under false identities]
Dr. Kesselring, we thought you might not make it. It says you had some trouble with your visa?

[faking a German accent]
Yes, and zen suddenly dey accepted American Express. Go figure.
We don't go home without it.
We're in a warehouse, and you just hit a cow. I think we better back up.

[yelling in Dave's ear]
Shazaam! Can you hear me?
Wally! I heard you! I heard your voice!
Hooray! You can hear me!
What?
You can hear me!

[shouts]
No, schmuck, I'm deaf! I'm deaf! Now do you get it?

[Addressing Wally, who is impersonating a Swedish gynecologist]
Which exercise would you find most beneficial to geriatric sexuality?

[faking a Swedish accent]
Oh, boy. Well, some of my patients prefer walking, some prefer bicycling. But for best results, to guarantee satisfaction, most of them like fucking. You know, poonta-poonta-poonta. I like it myself, you know. One in the morning, and late at night.
I think David got a little messed up.
What did she say?
She said she thinks you're an asshole!
Thirty-two years on the force, a wife and three kids and a blind guy and a deaf guy are making me look like a real asshole.
You got that right.
What?

[talking into radio]
Charlie over.

[to Raoul]
Stop right their or I'll throw this knife through your head! I mean it! I throw your brains out!

[to Raoul]
Freeze!

[to Raoul]
Thats more like it! Now put your hand up!

[to Raoul]
Put your hands in the air!

[to Raoul]
Oh, so you do speak English!
Do you really think you can stop Khomeini?
Not if it's funny.

[Wally is driving a stolen police car because Dave's hands are cuffed behind him]
Don't look at me, look at the road!

[Shrugs and turns his head back toward the road]
All right, if it'll make you feel better.
I'm not handicapped, I have you.
Who are you talking to?
I'm talking to you, you prick.
Why don't you look me in the eye and say that?
I would if I could but I can't, I'm blind.
You're blind?
Yes I'm blind, what are you fucking deaf?
Yes, I'm fucking deaf!
You're really deaf?
I'm really deaf.
Then how do you know what I'm saying?
Because I'm reading your lips now you want the job or not?
Well excusez-moi, monsieur hot shit!
Fucking-A. Something bothers you, fuck it. Your wife leaves you, fuck her. Your boss fires you, fuck him. Fucking-A. Fuckin'em. Right?
You're fucking right!
It's a gift to be able to do that.
Let me see a badge!

[holds up gun]
This is my badge!
What's the story here, Gatlin? I got the commissioner crawling up my ass!
WHO are you sir?

[misreading Cornfeld's lips]
Fine, thank you!
You look fine to me!
But you see, you're the ones they're looking for. Not me. If I get on that helicopter with the coin, I get out of here squeaky clean.
You're too tall for me anyway.
